com.soa.message
Interface MessageAttachments

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleMessageAttachments
public interface MessageAttachments

This interface represents a collection of attachments, each encapsulated in a MessagePart. The interface provides iterated access to the attachments in order to allow implementations to perform a best effort to manage the resources used by large attachments.

Method Summary
 MessagePart addAttachment(javax.activation.DataHandler content, Headers headers)
          Add an attachment.
 java.lang.Iterable<MessagePart> iterate()
          Iterate across all attachments
